headline: BD to Announce Financial Results for its Second Quarter of Fiscal 2025
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that BD management will host an audio webcast at 8 a.m. ET on Thursday, May 1, 2025 to discuss the Company's financial results for its second quarter of fiscal year 2025, which ended on March 31, 2025, and to provide an update on its operations and strategy. The audio webcast can be accessed at BD's investor relations website at www.bd.com/investors, and a replay will be made available sh
